title: Process for Developing English Reading Comprehension Strategies Based on Cognitive Task Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing Foreign Language Certification Exam Preparedness by Improving English Reading Comprehension for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can identify main ideas and details in English texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners can interpret complex English sentence structures with over 70% accuracy using cognitive task analysis techniques.
Learners can read English texts at a speed of 150+ words per minute using skimming, scanning, and inferential strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
